title: 9/13/2015: BATHINDA: AAP organises rally at Guru Gar Sahai
content: FEROZEPUR: The Aam Admi Party (AAP) held a rally at Guru Har Sahai, an assembly segment of Ferozepur district, on Saturday. A large number of workers of the party attended the rally. The meeting was held 96 hours before the scheduled rally of former...
